text: Ko woni sifa Aljanna fodaaɗo on gomɗuɓe ɓen: ina toon canɗi ndiyam ɗi dakamme mun waylaaki, e canɗi ɓira ɗi waylataa dakamme mun, e canɗi konnjam welayɗam yarooɓe, e canɗi njuuri laɓɓinaandi. Hino woodani ɓe kadi ton: kala dimɓe, e haforaneede immorde e Joomi maɓɓe. [Ɓen wa'oyay] wa luttinoyteeeɓe ɓen ka Yiite, ɓe yarnee ndiyam fatayɗam, ɗam taƴa tetekki maɓɓe ɗin
